TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Certificate2Collection extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打开存储区后，结果由对象表示。 When an store is opened, the result is represented by an object. 如果你熟悉非托管的加密 API 构造，则可将用作对象的内存存储。If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an as a memory store of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，只选择有效证书，允许用户选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于用户选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. [!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个空对象，这与使用证书或集合信息创建对象的其他构造函数不同。This constructor creates an empty object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，只选择有效证书，允许用户选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于用户选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. [!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将对象添加到集合，并返回证书的索引位置。This method adds an object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有要添加 到对象的对象的数组，请使用此方法。Use this method if you have an array of objects to add to an object. 和 方法以事务方式处理请求，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，整个操作将中止。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不需要用户交互 ，请使用此方法查找对象。Use this method to find objects if no user interaction is needed. 使用方法可允许用户选择对象。 Use the method to allow the user to select objects. 请注意，此方法可用于级联或嵌套样式，通过每次调用方法缩小搜索条件。Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅查找有效证书，允许用户选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, finds only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于用户选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于受密码保护的 PFX/PKCS12 二进制大型对象（BLOB）。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password. 可在 PFX/PKCS12 BLOB 中创建与证书关联的密钥容器，并使用该值来控制此过程。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the value can be used to control this process. 请注意，如果不创建密钥容器，则不会保留私钥。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 此方法将证书字节数组导入证书的集合。This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates. 此方法支持以下类型：This method supports the following types: - - - - -

param.span: 控制如何导入证书以及导入地点的枚举值的按位组合。

summary.span: 将要求密码的证书文件导入到 对象。

span.span: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于 PFX/PKCS12 文件或其他需要密码的证书文件。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password. 可以创建与 PFX/PKCS12 文件中的证书相关联的密钥容器 ，并且可以使用该值来控制此进程。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and value can be used to control this process. 请注意，如果不创建密钥容器，则不会保留私钥。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 文件可以包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate. 此方法将导入与私钥关联的第一个证书，或者，如果未找到私钥，则找到第一个证书。This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found. 此方法支持以下类型：This method supports the following types: - - - - - -

summary.span: 从 对象中移除数组中的多个 对象。

span.span: Removes multiple objects in an array from an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有要从对象中移除的对象的数组，请使用此方法。Use this method if you have an array of objects to remove from an object. 和 方法以事务方式处理请求，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，整个操作将中止。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveRange(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates) cil managed

param.name: certificates
param.span: 对象。

span.span: An object.

summary.span: 从 对象中移除另一个 对象中的多个 对象。

span.span: Removes multiple objects in an object from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要从另一个 对象中删除的对象中有证书，请使用此方法。Use this method if you have certificates in an object that you want to remove from another object. 和 方法以事务方式处理请求，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，整个操作将中止。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

span.span: is .
